name: ext_R5_PlanDefinition_ac_documentation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PlanDefinition.action.documentation for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.documentation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: Supporting documentation for the intended performer of the action
element.definition: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.documentation` maps to R3 `PlanDefinition.action.documentation`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
